name: Faces of Doom
description:
An evil wizard has disrupted the peace on the moon of Titan and its up to you to stop him from spreading an unholy evil that could destroy your beloved home.

Upon beating the game, you can use a level select cheat. On the main menu hit a number key to warp to the desired level.
